body.name: Air Purifier for Large Room With High CARD Rate, Portable Desktop Air Purifier With H13 True HEPA Filter and 3 Modes for Travelling Small Room, Bedroom, Home,Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 22 mins
features: 💞Updated Aerodynamics 💞 With an integrated DC brushless motor & fan uni-body design, this air purifier drives about 210% more airflow output compared to older version of EPI810 and most similar size purifiers with a 20% larger body.

💞 Save Energy & Effective💞Updated version uses a Brushless 12V 8W DC (older version 5W) integrated motor and fan unibody with over 80% of energy efficiency; Only 8W at top speed, its 4-stage filter cleans particles as small as 0.3 microns in a space of 968 sq ft with 2 circulation in 1 hour (210% higher than older version).

💞Larger Filter 💞-With a 80% larger filter than older EPI810, it filters 0.3 micron and larger particles (POLLEN, DUST, PET DANDER) and absorbs VOC, odor etc, in a space of 968 sq ft with 2 circulations in 1 hour (110% higher compared to older EPI810) and other similar size air purifiers.
💞Quieter💞The new version works silently at sound levels as low as 24dB (compared to 26dB of older verison). When not touched, it goes completely dark at any fan level when you prefer it to be dark.

💞MEGAWISE Quality & Support💞MEGAWISE designs and manufactures products with the methodology of LEAN (adopted by Famous Brands such as Toyota and GE). Voice of Customer is contantly anaylized by its product team. 24* Live Chat Support team who want you100% happy with any issue or feedback. Updated version filter (Search B09MVSB3S9) is over twice the size of the old version(Search for B08G13KQWV) to clean more air in service life.
body.description: Breathe cleaner and healthier air with our desk air purifier. It uses H13 HEPA filter material to remove 99.97% of airborne pollutants as small as 0.3 microns, like odor, pet dander, pollen, dust etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've only been using it 2 days but so far it's made a difference for the good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You could of put the right information down the device is dc powered not battery powered like it says that was a lie. That was the whole point I bought it for a battery powered not dc powered misleading advertising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a smaller room
reviews.reviewText: We have two of these now and placed one in the kitchen and one upstairs. They work well and help with keeping the dust down and odders out. For the kitchen, we should have considered getting a bigger one to help with the kitchen cooking odds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars if you don't run it on max the noise level is sleepable
reviews.reviewText: i have this in our bedroom, it doesn't seem to help filter the air a lot, but i think because of the size of the room i need two, its easy to work, on the highest setting its isnt super loud but you can hear it, after a while though we have gotten use to the sound and leave it on all the timethe portability is also a plus, the filters are kind of pricey about half the cost of the machine so hopefully the machine will last a while for it to balance out in cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete trash - misleading, only 1 speed fan, no way to turn off
reviews.reviewText: I read the directions and tried holding the one and only button (power)for 3-5 seconds to turn off the unit, but nothing happened. When you tap the power button to supposedly switch between low, medium, high, and super speeds it makes a beep sound but the fan does NOT change in any way. Either I received a faulty unit, or this is complete trash, and as another reviewer said, "This is landfill fodder." Well said, mate.The only way to turn it off is to unplug it.The unit is also larger than it needs to be, which is really just a waste of plastic. No wonder this is the cheapest air filter I found on Amazon - my bet is it'll be discontinued if it isn't already, and soon deleted from the marketplace.Perhaps my biggest frustration is now I have to go out of my way to a Kohl's and stand in line for 15 minutes while I wait to return this junk. I miss the free UPS Store returns - Amazon should bring that back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really love this purifier but I’m confused what filter I need to buy as a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathe Easy with Azeus: The Air Purifier that Turns Your Room into a Fresh-Air Haven!
reviews.reviewText: Listen up, my fellow air-breathing buddies, because I've got a game-changer for you. This Air Purifier is here to rescue your lungs from the clutches of indoor pollutants and turn your space into a haven of fresh, clean air. Trust me, this little powerhouse is like having a personal superhero battling invisible villains for your respiratory well-being!Let's dive into the nitty-gritty details, shall we? This air purifier is specifically designed for larger rooms, making it perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, home offices, and even small-sized offices. It's like having a tiny air-cleaning maestro silently working its magic in the background. Now, let's talk about the star of the show – the H13 True HEPA filter. This bad boy doesn't mess around when it comes to capturing those pesky airborne particles. Dust, pet dander, pollen, smoke – you name it, this filter traps it. It's like having a vacuum cleaner for the air, ensuring you breathe in nothing but the freshest of fresh air.Also! This purifier boasts not one, not two, but three modes to cater to your every need. There's the Sleep Mode, which operates with a whisper-quiet hum, allowing you to snooze away while the purifier works its magic. Then we have the Auto Mode, which adjusts the fan speed based on the air quality, ensuring optimal purification at all times. And finally, the High Mode, for those moments when you need a turbo boost of air-cleaning power. It's like having a selection of speed settings for your very own air-purifying race car!Another thing I love about this purifier is its portability. It's compact and lightweight, making it a breeze to move around. Whether you're traveling and need a breath of fresh air in your hotel room or want to bring it from your living room to your bedroom, it's as easy as carrying a fluffy cloud. Plus, the sleek design blends seamlessly with any decor, making it a stylish addition to your air-purifying arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Purifier works, but higher settings get very loud
reviews.reviewText: I have this down in my family room near where I sit. As far as I can tell, it does seem to remove some order in the area, though not fantastically. I can still smell things coming from the kitchen for a while, despite having this right next to me. I assume that it just can't handle that level of odor permeating the room. As far as dust and stuff, I'd assume it's removing that too, but I have no way to really gauge how well it's doing that. It could just be that despite having it next to me, the room it's in is just to big for it to work at all. The other thing is that it's loud. The only setting where you don't hear it much is the lowest setting. But that's not very powerful. I have it set to the 3rd highest level and it's noisy, but at least the fan isn't high pitched at all and has a consistent hum, so it's very easy to tune out. Overall, I do think there are better models of portable purifier out there that I would consider first.
